HTMLLinkElementSizes.summary: The sizes read-only property of the interfaces defines the sizes of the icons for visual media contained in the resource. It reflects the {{HTMLElement("link")}} element's sizes attribute, which takes a list of space-separated sizes, each in the format <width in pixels>x<height in pixels>, or the keyword any.

remarks.para: It is only relevant if the is icon or a non-standard type like apple-touch-icon.
